sentences.en: Absurdly, it makes shoppers overpay farmers to grow too much food.
sentences.cn: 荒谬的是，这样会使得购物者支付过多的钱让农民去种太多的粮食。

sentences.en: I want to apply for the return of the money I overpay for my fine.
sentences.cn: 我想申请拿回多缴的罚款.

sentences.en: If I overpay I won'tto make a profit in the future.
sentences.cn: 如果我超付了,那么我就不能得到利益了.

sentences.en: Most big companies continue to overpay their top executives.
sentences.cn: 多数大公司继续给高管支付过高的薪水。
我们向该发票多付了245美元.

trans.tran_en: to pay someone more money than they deserve
to pay someone more money than they deserve

trans.tran_cn: 多付给（某人）钱，给（某人）过高报酬
trans.tran_en: to pay someone more money than they deserve
